channel.title: Help
channel.description: Okay, I have the source, client, utorrent, no-ip, everything's all set-up I can get on, but no one else can, WHY?!!?!? Everything is set-up, nothing is bad.. at least i don't think... just please help, IP: EvolutionxScape.no-ip.info

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

1). You don’t need uTorrent for this of situation.
2). Are you Static or Dynamic IP-Address?

Static: - Your IP-Address doesn’t change, unless you unplug your modem for at least 5-12 hours.

Dynamic: - It changes periodical and also when you gets DDoS’d it’ll change.

It’ll either be your router/modem problem, i’d say or you’re doing something wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Help

item.description:
@theonewhocan wrote:

Okay if you have skype, msn, aim, facebook, please tell me. I need help, thanks ;D

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

You probably need to change the direct ip for the client so others can connect. Search for Serverip = in your gui.java and go from there. If you don’t have gui it’s either egui or in your client.java

Read full topic
